" 1188. 28th January. Malleson telegraphs 26th January : " All the mistaken (sic) London telegrams are disseminated broadcast by the Bolsheviks as evidence of terror we are said to be in. Can nothing be done to control scaremongering of home Press just at present time ? They do positive harm here, and I have little doubt more truculent tone of Bolsheviks is due to these reports." We can endorse these views as regards India.
